verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I am a new creation
No more in condemnation
Here in the grace of God
I stand!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My heart is overflowing
My love just keeps on growing
Here in the grace of God
I stand!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And I will praise You Lord
Yes I will praise You Lord
And I will sing of all
That You have done

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
A Joy that knows no limit
A lightness in my spirit
Here in the grace of God
I stand!
